General.Name: Neoenergia S.A
General.Description: Neoenergia S.A. generates, transmits, distributes, trades in, and commercializes electric energy in Brazil. The company operates hydroelectric plants, wind farms, transmission lines, solar farm, and substations; and distributes electricity in the states of Bahia, Pernambuco, Rio Grande do Norte, São Paulo, and Mato Grosso do Sul. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Neoenergia S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Iberdrola Energía, S.A.U.
General.Address: Praia do Flamengo 78, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 22210-030
